author: trawick
msg: ouch, we need a couple more fixes to really get the buffered

author: trawick
msg: fix an old misfeature: "BufferedLogs Off" would sort-of turn
buffered logging on as it set the log writer to the buffered log
writer, though it would leave the are-logs-buffered flag off
this misfeature combined with recent mutex logic for buffered logs
led to a segfault with "BufferedLogs Off"

author: gregames
msg: review was fine, extra credit for cleaning up the duplication of signal
handling between the mpms.  Tested on RH9 w/prefork - no regression,
worker - no regression, enabled mod_backtrace here which worked as expected
once I set EnableExceptionHook On in httpd.conf.

author: trawick
msg: a kind fix for a compile error unfortunately broke an order
dependency...  the buffered logs array needs to be initialized
